instruction: Construct an outline for a speech about how technology has impacted the world.
output:
I. Introduction 
A. Definition of technology 
B. Historical overview of how technology has impacted the world 

II. Positive Impacts of Technology 
A. Improved communication 
B. Increased access to information 
C. Enhanced productivity 

III. Negative Impacts of Technology 
A. Diminished social interaction 
B. Loss of privacy 
C. Negative environmental consequences 

IV. Conclusion 
A. Technology has had both positive and negative impacts on the world 
B. We must strive to use technology wisely and responsibly in order to maximize the benefits and minimize any potential harms
